title: How to fix frustrating iOS 11 problems | Trusted Reviews
description: ![iOS 11]()If you’d rather not deal with these pestering issues, you can revert back tothe older formats. Just head into **Settings > Camera > Formats and click‘More Compatible**’.## **Apps not working in iOS 11**With the switch to iOS 11, Apple has finally killed support for phones andapps that are still 32-bit. Apple switched to a 64-bit processor with theiPhone 5S, and this means any phone before this isn’t compatible with iOS 11.It all means that any app not updated in the last few years to support 64-bitwill not work anymore.**Found any problems with iOS 11? Tweet us @TrustedReviews**
